content: the basket full of friendship cowl was designed to showcase a beautiful skein of tonal dk yarn from the yarn patch in tn that was gifted to me by a fellow knitter i met denis b and his wife on a transatlantic sailing when a small crafting group met up on sea days of which there were many when do you do a crossing we had knitters and crocheters in the group from canada and the us denis joined the group and was working on a basketweave project as a gift and so it felt only fitting that the cowl design would include a stitch that he was familiar with denis introduced me to the yarns of his lys in tn - the yarn patch - and to heather the dyer i loved knitting with heather s yarn and the soft and squishy cowl practically came up with its own name when combining the stitch with the friendship that has grown out of our meeting on a cruise ship the möbius cowl has a fluid twist and no right or wrong side - it s a continuous loop that will provide warmth and comfort on cold days and is a reminder that we can all be connected by friendship i hope you enjoy knitting your own basket full of friendship
